scriptspc.clean: echo Cleaning... && mkdirp es5-build && rmdir /s /q es5-build
scriptspc.build:es2015: echo "Transpiling and building es2015..." && npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc && polymer build && move build\es5 es5-build
scriptspc.build:es2017: echo "Transpiling and building es2017..." npm run lint && tsc -t es2017 && polymer build && rmdir /s /q build\es5 && move es5-build build\es5
scriptspc.build: npm run build:es2015 && npm run build:es2017
scriptspc.postpublish: echo "Moving Publish Scripts to Root..." && move build\es6\Web.config build\Web.config && move build\es6\Web.Release.config build\Web.Release.config && move build\es6\Web.Debug.config build\Web.Debug.config && move build\es6\publish.csproj build\publish.csproj && move build\es6\Properties build\Properties

scripts.clean: echo Cleaning... && mkdirp es5-build && rm -r es5-build
scripts.build:es2015: echo "Transpiling and building es2015..." && npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc && polymer build && mv build/es5 es5-build
scripts.build:es2017: echo "Transpiling and building es2017..." npm run lint && tsc -t es2017 && polymer build && rm -r build/es5 && mv es5-build build/es5
scripts.build: npm run build:es2015 && npm run build:es2017
scripts.postpublish: echo "Moving Publish Scripts to Root..." && move build/es6/Web.config build/Web.config && mv build/es6/Web.Release.config build/Web.Release.config && mv build/es6/Web.Debug.config build/Web.Debug.config && mv build/es6/publish.csproj build/publish.csproj && mv build/es6/Properties build/Properties
